name: Triple Threat (swilliamsio, CompozerJun)
description:
You are but a lone pilot with a curious triple designed space ship. Fight through endless waves of alien attackers; attain the highest possible score.

---

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys - move
  • Space/LMB - fire

---

This game was made as part of the GMTK Game Jam 2021. The theme of the jam was Joined Together. The code for this game can be found on GitHub.
